name: nativescript-rich-textfield
description: Nativescript plugin that provides textfield with icon and exposes a few additional attributes for styling

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: cd demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios --emulator
scripts.test.ios.device: cd demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios
scripts.test.android: cd demo && tns platform remove android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-rich-textfield && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
